definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: dealing, recompence, benefit—´[[ג]] Ps 94:2 + 11 t.; sf. [[גְּמֻלְךָ]] Ob:Ob 15, etc.; pl. sf. [[גְּמוּלָיו]] Ps 103:2; —
[[גְּמוּל יׇדַיִם]] dealing of the hands Ju Jdg 9:16, Pr 12:14 ([[יׇשׁוּב לְ]]) Is 3:11 ([[יֵעָשֶׂה לְ]]).

dealing, hence (from context) equivalent of dealing, recompence: c. suff. Ob:Ob 15 [[גמלך ישׁוב בראשׁך]], Joe 3:4, Joe 3:7 ([[הֵשִׁיב]]), so with [[הֵשִׁיב לְ]] Ps 28:4; [[שִׁלֵּם לְ]] Ps 137:8, Pr 19:17; absolutely [[גְּמוּל לְ]] ([[הֵשִׁיב]]) [[שִׁלֵם]] Is 59:18, Is 59:18, Is 66:6, Je 51:6, La 3:64; [[עַל]] Joe 4:4, Ps 94:2; Is 35:4 ´[[ג]] [[אלהים]] the recompence of God.
benefit: [[אַל]] [[תשׁכחי כל גמוליו]] Ps 103:2; [[כגמול עליו]] according to the benefit (done) unto him 2Ch 32:25
